mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item_list ("name", item_type, manufactor, model, "count", remain, price, ex_data, "desc", ins_date) VALUES (#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param5}, #{param6}, #{param7}, #{param8}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP())
mapper.select: SELECT item_list.id, item_list.name, item_type.name AS item_type, item_list.model, item_list.count, item_list.remain, item_list.price, item_list.ins_date, item_list.up_date FROM item_list LEFT JOIN item_type ON item_list.item_type = item_type.id WHERE item_list.name = #{param1} AND item_list.remain > 0 AND item_list.is_alive = 1 ORDER BY item_list.ins_date
SELECT ex_data FROM item_list WHERE item_type = #{param1} LIMIT 1
